dict.acceptation: 电影院；电影艺术；电影业；电影；

sent.orig: Follow this street until you get to a barber's, the cinema is a little further on.
sent.trans: 顺着这条街到一家理发店处，电影院再往前一点儿。
这座电影院大约可坐2000人。

sent.orig: In the evening he did not have any work, so he went to a cinema.
sent.trans: 晚上他没活干就去了一家电影院。

sent.orig: Certainly, at the Gu Lou Cinema.
It is too late to go to the cinema.
